title: Lemony Greek salad
ingredients: ['1 tablespoon lemon juice', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '1 tablespoon mint jelly', '1 tablespoon capers, finely chopped', '1 heaped teaspoon garlic paste', '3 tomatoes', '1/2 cucumber', '1 red onion', '200g feta cheese', '1 handful basil', '1 small handful flat leafed parsley']
